mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(orderId, memberId, productNo, amount) VALUES(seq_cart.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{productNo}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.orderId AS orderId, c.memberId AS memberId, p.productNo AS productNo, m.name AS userName, p.name AS productName, c.amount, p.price AS productPrice, (price* amount) money FROM MEMBER m, PRODUCT p, CART c WHERE m.memberId = c.memberId AND p.productNo = c.productNo AND c.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY c.orderId
